name: Quaker City Mercantile
description:
Quaker City Mercantile is a hybrid of 19th century mercantilism and 21st century brand artistry. We create brands from the ground up and bring them to market. This includes all aspects of manufacturing, distribution and marketing. We work in three ways: self-funded, equity partners with investors and work for hire. We then stay on to manage the health and growth of the brands.
We create for extended periods providing services such as visual design, content creation, social media and overall brand strategy.
